Question
========
When waves spread out around the edge of a barrier, ______ occurs.


Answerlist
----------
* diffraction
* refraction
* reflection
* rarefaction
* resonance
* interference
* superposition


Solution
========
Diffraction occurs when waves spread out around the edge of a barrier.
